```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(nycflights)
```


## table3

```{r}
table3 %>%
  separate(..., into = c(..., ...), sep = "/", convert = TRUE)
```

```{r}
table3 %>%
  separate(..., into = c(..., ...), sep = "/", convert = TRUE) %>%
  ...(...)
```


## To table3

```{r}
table2 %>%
  ...(...) %>% 
  unite(..., ......., sep = "/")
```


## Hours and minutes

```{r}
# Use a numeric value for sep

flights %>%
  separate(..., into = c(..., ...), sep = ..., convert = TRUE) %>% 
  separate(..., into = c(..., ...), sep = ..., convert = TRUE)
```
